creator: 7Span
descriptionHtml:
WhatsHash Product Catalog and Order Management App helps you to make mobile-friendly product catalogues on your phone and share it on WhatsApp with your buyers with few clicks.

For the complete and advanced features on store management, you can download the Mobile/Desktop Apps.

WhatsHash Mobile App Features:
💥 QuickBlast
You can send a message to your contacts or audience from your WhatsHash desktop app super quickly by pressing back and send super quickly with QuickBlast feature.

⚡ QuickSend
You can send a message to any number without saving them in your contact list.

📜 Product Catalog
You can have all your products to share with your contacts in WhatsApp on a click of a button. Create a product catalog with a wide range of configurations from desktop app. Creating a catalogue on WhatsApp was never such easy before :)

📧 Share on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business
Share your products on a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp.

🔁 Contact Sync with WhatsHash Desktop App
Sync your contacts with WhatsHash desktop app to get the seamless experience to chat with contacts on WhatsApp. It will sync contacts from your Phone to Desktop App and Desktop App to Phone as well.

===========================================================

WhatsHash Desktop App Features:
📜 Product Catalog
Create a product catalog with a wide range of configurations. Creating a catalogue on WhatsApp was never such easy before :)

📧 Share on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business
Share your products on a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp.

📦 Inventory Management
Keep your product inventory up to date and manage your products and categories easily from anywhere and anytime.

💰 Order Management
Order management on WhatsApp without any system is always challenging. With the help of WhatsHash, you can view the order details easily and also can manage Order Status, Payment Status, etc.

📊 Dashboard with Reports
Dashboard to review your sales reports with graphically reach presentations.

📒 Private Notes
Save any important message/notes of your customer on WhatsHash.

And many more features which will change the way of doing business in WhatsApp. Standout from the crowd and try WhatsHash now 😎

For any queries/feedback, write to us at yo@whatshash.com or WhatsApp us on +91-9724515451.
For more visit whatshash.com

descriptionHtml:
WhatsHash's free store will help you launch your online store or digital dukaan with a beautiful product catalog feature and start selling on WhatsApp. With one click share, you can share products with your customers and start collecting orders from WhatsApp.

WhatsHash offers,
1. Online Digital Store
2. Poll on WhatsApp
3. CRM to manage your WhatsApp communication

Steps to start using WhatsHash:
1. Signup and Login to WhatsHash
2. Create your BizPage
3. Add category, products, shipping configurations, checkout fields, payment integrations
4. Share product/catalog/store links with customers on WhatsApp
5. Start receiving orders 😎

Why WhatsHash?
WhatsHash is an app that helps you in managing your entire business on WhatsApp. WhatsHash offers features like Store, Poll, and CRM as well with which you can run your business seamlessly.

If you are searching for the below queries, then you are at the right place.
- Store for Vegetable or Fruits Shop
- Store for Grocery Shop
- Store for Fish and Meat
- Online store for Restaurants
- Store for Instagram Products
- Store for Clothes
- WhatsApp CRM
- CRM for Travel Agents
- Poll on WhatsApp

Mobile App Features:
👉🏻 Biz Page
Create your one touch biz page where your customer can check your business details and connects with you.

📜 Product Catalog
You can have all your products to share with your contacts in WhatsApp with a click of a button. Create a product catalog with a wide range of configurations. Creating a catalogue on WhatsApp was never such easy before :)

💌 Share Products on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business or any Social Platform
Share your products with a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp or other social platforms.

💰 Order Management
Order management on WhatsApp without any system is always challenging. With the help of WhatsHash, you can view the order details easily and manage Order Status, Payment Status, etc.

💵 Payment Integrations
You can integrate the payment gateways like Stripe, Razorpay, Paystack, Paytm, or set PayLater and collect as per your convenience.

📊 Dashboard with Reports
Dashboard to review your sales reports with all the detailed statistics.

⚡ QuickSend [Coming Soon]
You can send a message to any number without saving them in your contact list.

💥 QuickBlast [Coming Soon]
You can send a message to your contacts or audience from your WhatsHash desktop app super quickly by pressing back and send super-fast with the QuickBlast feature.

And many more features that will change the way of doing business. Stand out from the crowd and try WhatsHash now. 😎

For any queries/feedback, please write to us at support@whatshash.com or WhatsApp us on +91 88665 88661.
For more, visit whatshash.com

creator: 7Span
descriptionHtml:
WhatsHash is now Vepaar.
Vepaar's free store will help you launch your online store or digital dukaan with a beautiful product catalog feature and start selling on WhatsApp.  With one click share, you can share products with your customers and start collecting orders from WhatsApp. 

Vepaar offers,
1. Online Digital Store
2. Poll on WhatsApp
3. CRM to manage your WhatsApp communication
4. Your 1 Page Business Website/Biz Page

Steps to start using Vepaar:
1. Signup and Login
2. Create your BizPage 
3. Add category, products, shipping configurations, checkout fields, payment integrations
4. Share product/catalog/store links with customers on WhatsApp
5. Start receiving orders 😎

Why Vepaar?
Vepaar is an app that helps you in managing your entire business on WhatsApp. Vepaar offers features like Store, Poll, and CRM as well with which you can run your business seamlessly. 

If you are searching for the below queries, then you are at the right place. 
- Store for Vegetable or Fruits Shop
- Store for Grocery Shop
- Store for Fish and Meat
- Online store for Restaurants
- Store for Instagram Products
- Store for Clothes 
- WhatsApp CRM 
- CRM for Travel Agents
- Poll on WhatsApp

Mobile App Features:
👉🏻 Biz Page
Create your one-touch biz page where your customer can check your business details and connects with you.

📜 Product Catalog
You can have all your products to share with your contacts in WhatsApp with a click of a button. Create a product catalog with a wide range of configurations. Creating a catalog on WhatsApp was never such easy before :) 

💌 Share Products on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business or any Social Platform 
Share your products with a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp or other social platforms. 

💰 Order Management
Order management on WhatsApp without any system is always challenging. With the help of Vepaar, you can view the order details easily and manage Order Status, Payment Status, etc. 

💵 Payment Integrations
You can integrate the payment gateways like Stripe, Razorpay, Paystack, Paytm, or set PayLater and collect as per your convenience. 

📊 Dashboard with Reports
Dashboard to review your sales reports with all the detailed statistics. 

⚡ QuickSend
You can send a message to any number without saving them in your contact list.

💥 QuickBlast [Coming Soon]
You can send a message to your contacts or audience from your Vepaar web app super quickly by pressing back and send super-fast with the QuickBlast feature.

And many more features that will change the way of doing business. Stand out from the crowd and try Vepaar now. 😎

For any queries/feedback, please write to us at support@vepaar.com or WhatsApp us on +91 88665 88661.
For more, visit vepaar.com

Instagram: https://instagram.com/VepaarHQ

Vepaar's free store will help you launch your online store or digital dukaan with a beautiful product catalog feature and start selling on WhatsApp.  With one click share, you can share products with your customers and start collecting orders from WhatsApp. 

Vepaar offers,
1. Online Digital Store
2. Poll on WhatsApp
3. CRM to manage your WhatsApp communication
4. Your 1 Page Business Website/Biz Page

Steps to start using Vepaar:
1. Signup and Login
2. Create your BizPage 
3. Add category, products, shipping configurations, checkout fields, payment integrations
4. Share product/catalog/store links with customers on WhatsApp
5. Start receiving orders 😎

Why Vepaar?
Vepaar is an app that helps you in managing your entire business on WhatsApp. Vepaar offers features like Store, Poll, and CRM as well with which you can run your business seamlessly. 

If you are searching for the below queries, then you are at the right place. 
- Store for Vegetable or Fruits Shop
- Store for Grocery Shop
- Store for Fish and Meat
- Online store for Restaurants
- Store for Instagram Products
- Store for Clothes 
- WhatsApp CRM 
- CRM for Travel Agents
- Poll on WhatsApp

Mobile App Features:
👉🏻 Biz Page
Create your one-touch biz page where your customer can check your business details and connects with you.

📜 Product Catalog
You can have all your products to share with your contacts in WhatsApp with a click of a button. Create a product catalog with a wide range of configurations. Creating a catalog on WhatsApp was never such easy before :) 

💌 Share Products on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business or any Social Platform 
Share your products with a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp or other social platforms. 

💰 Order Management
Order management on WhatsApp without any system is always challenging. With the help of Vepaar, you can view the order details easily and manage Order Status, Payment Status, etc. 

💵 Payment Integrations
You can integrate the payment gateways like Stripe, Razorpay, Paystack, Paytm, or set PayLater and collect as per your convenience. 

📊 Dashboard with Reports
Dashboard to review your sales reports with all the detailed statistics. 

⚡ QuickSend
You can send a message to any number without saving them in your contact list.

💥 QuickBlast [Coming Soon]
You can send a message to your contacts or audience from your Vepaar web app super quickly by pressing back and send super-fast with the QuickBlast feature.

And many more features that will change the way of doing business. Stand out from the crowd and try Vepaar now. 😎

For any queries/feedback, please write to us at support@vepaar.com or WhatsApp us on +91 88665 88661.
For more, visit vepaar.com

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://fb.com/VepaarHQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/VepaarHQ
Instagram: https://instagram.com/VepaarHQ

Vepaar offers,
1. Online Digital Store
2. Poll on WhatsApp
3. CRM to manage your WhatsApp communication
4. Your 1 Page Business Website/Biz Page

Steps to start using Vepaar:
1. Signup and Login
2. Create your BizPage 
3. Add category, products, shipping configurations, checkout fields, payment integrations
4. Share product/catalog/store links with customers on WhatsApp
5. Start receiving orders 😎

Why Vepaar?
Vepaar is an app that helps you in managing your entire business on WhatsApp. Vepaar offers features like Store, Poll, and CRM as well with which you can run your business seamlessly. 

If you are searching for the below queries, then you are at the right place. 
- Store for Vegetable or Fruits Shop
- Store for Grocery Shop
- Store for Fish and Meat
- Online store for Restaurants
- Store for Instagram Products
- Store for Clothes 
- WhatsApp CRM 
- CRM for Travel Agents
- Poll on WhatsApp

👉🏻 Biz Page
Create your one-touch biz page where your customer can check your business details and connects with you.

Share your products with a click of a button to your buyer's WhatsApp or other social platforms.

container.value: 511, iSquare Corporate Park, Science City Road, Sola, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India - 380060.

creator: 7Span
descriptionHtml:
Start Selling Online for Free with Vepaar Store!

Join our community of over 100,000 entrepreneurs and begin your journey into e-commerce today. Vepaar Store is designed to help you start selling online without any upfront costs. Whether you want to sell physical products, digital goods, or services, Vepaar provides the easiest way to set up your online store.

Insightful Dashboard & Orders
Get started with our intuitive dashboard, which offers essential statistics to help you manage your sales effectively. Track your performance and make informed decisions to enhance your business strategy.

Everything You Need to Sell Online
Under the ‘Store’ section, you’ll find countless features that streamline your business management:

Product Creation: Easily create various product types—simple, variable, and digital. Whether it’s a single item or a complex offering, we’ve got you covered.

Categories: Organize your products by designing a comprehensive catalog with unlimited categories. Make it easy for customers to find what they’re looking for.

Custom Badges: Highlight specific products with customizable badges that make them stand out in your store.

Charges Setup: Implement taxes, bulk order fees, gift wrapping, and other charges tailored to your business needs.

Inventory Management: Keep a close eye on your stock levels and make adjustments to product quantities with ease.

Shipping Options: Set delivery prices based on cart value, areas you serve, or product weight to provide a seamless customer experience.

Sell Digital Products
Your online store isn’t limited to just physical commodities. Vepaar allows you to tap into the growing market for digital products, including e-books, software, audio, media, and more.

Customize Your Checkout Process
With Vepaar, you can fully customize your checkout form to match your requirements. Enable or disable fields as needed to enhance the customer experience and streamline the purchasing process.

Product Variants and Attributes
Create multiple product variants with customizable options for stock, pricing, images, and more. Define unique attributes for each product to help customers make informed decisions.

Checkout Add-Ons
Offer additional services at checkout, such as gift wrapping or personalized messages, to elevate the shopping experience for your customers.

Quick User Authentication via WhatsApp
For faster checkouts, Vepaar allows customers to place orders through WhatsApp. A brief authentication process ensures secure transactions, making the buying experience quicker and more convenient.

Coupon Management
Easily create and manage coupon codes for your customers. You can define minimum and maximum discount amounts, set usage limits, and choose whether to display the coupons on your store.

Seamless Payment Integrations
Vepaar Store features smooth payment integrations that facilitate easy and secure transactions. Say goodbye to complicated payment processes and enjoy a more straightforward checkout experience for your customers.
descriptionShort: Easily create and manage your own online e-commerce store for free with Vepaar!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:

Now you can choose product variants and see more details like measurements and categories in the order screen. Plus, enjoy a new onboarding flow, updated profile, contact option for orders, and an improved help section!

Manage your store more efficiently with our latest update!

Checkout Add-Ons
Offer additional services at checkout, such as gift wrapping or personalized messages, to elevate the shopping experience for your customers.

Quick User Authentication via WhatsApp
For faster checkouts, Vepaar allows customers to place orders through WhatsApp. A brief authentication process ensures secure transactions, making the buying experience quicker and more convenient.

Coupon Management
Easily create and manage coupon codes for your customers. You can define minimum and maximum discount amounts, set usage limits, and choose whether to display the coupons on your store.

Seamless Payment Integrations
Vepaar Store features smooth payment integrations that facilitate easy and secure transactions. Say goodbye to complicated payment processes and enjoy a more straightforward checkout experience for your customers.

Join our community of over 100,000 entrepreneurs and begin your journey into e-commerce today. Vepaar Store is designed to help you start selling online without any upfront costs. Whether you want to sell physical products, digital goods, or services, Vepaar provides the easiest way to set up your online store.

Insightful Dashboard & Orders
Get started with our intuitive dashboard, which offers essential statistics to help you manage your sales effectively. Track your performance and make informed decisions to enhance your business strategy.

Everything You Need to Sell Online
Under the ‘Store’ section, you’ll find countless features that streamline your business management:

Product Creation: Easily create various product types—simple, variable, and digital. Whether it’s a single item or a complex offering, we’ve got you covered.

Categories: Organize your products by designing a comprehensive catalog with unlimited categories. Make it easy for customers to find what they’re looking for.

Custom Badges: Highlight specific products with customizable badges that make them stand out in your store.

Charges Setup: Implement taxes, bulk order fees, gift wrapping, and other charges tailored to your business needs.

Inventory Management: Keep a close eye on your stock levels and make adjustments to product quantities with ease.

Shipping Options: Set delivery prices based on cart value, areas you serve, or product weight to provide a seamless customer experience.

Sell Digital Products
Your online store isn’t limited to just physical commodities. Vepaar allows you to tap into the growing market for digital products, including e-books, software, audio, media, and more.
